MergeResults.query: select "FirstName", "LastName","Status","Specialty" from static."OMAccount" where "UniqueIntegrationId" in ('CHRISTOPOULOS-GN','EVANS-WB','NO-KJ','RIZVI-ZH') order by "UniqueIntegrationId"

OCEResults.sfQuery: select Name, DeveloperName from Territory2 where DeveloperName ='O{{ScenarioTerritory.SOMTerritoryId__c[0]}}'

OCEResults.query: select g."Code" "Name",'Brick To Territory' "RecordTypeName",t."Name" "Territories" from OUTPUT."OMGeographyTerritory" gt join OUTPUT."OMTerritory" t on t."SOMTerritoryId" = gt."SOMTerritoryId" join STATIC."OMGeography" g on g."SOMGeographyId" = gt."SOMGeographyId" where gt."SOMGeographyId" = '{{Geography.SOMGeographyId__c}}' and gt."SOMTerritoryId" = '{{ScenarioTerritory.SOMTerritoryId__c[0]}}' and gt."EffectiveDate" = '{{Scenario.EffectiveDate__c}}'
OCEResults.sfQuery: select Name, OCE__RecordTypeName__c, OCE__Territories__c from OCE__TerritoryAlignmentRule__c where Name = '{{Geography.Code__c}}'

select Territory2.Name, Object.LastName from ObjectTerritory2Association where Object.LastName in ('CHRISTOPOULOS','EVANS','NO','RIZVI') and Territory2.Name in ('{{ScenarioTerritory.Name[0]}}') order by Territory2.Name, Object.Id
select OCE__StartDate__c, OCE__EndDate__c from OCE__Period__c where OCE__UniqueIntegrationID__c = '{{ScenarioEngagementPlan.SOMEngagementPlanId__c}}' order by OCE__StartDate__c

OCEResults.query: select distinct e."EffectiveDate" "StartDate", e."EndDate", 'Approved' "Status", terr."Name" "Territory", 'AccountGoal' "Type", terr."Name"||'-'||e."UniqueIntegrationId" "UniqueIntegrationID",terr."Name"||'-'||e."Name" "Name" from OUTPUT."OMEngagementResult" r join OUTPUT."OMEngagementPlan" e on e."SOMEngagementPlanId" = r."SOMEngagementPlanId" join OUTPUT."OMTerritory" terr on terr."SOMTerritoryId" = r."SOMTerritoryId" where r."SOMEngagementPlanId" = '{{ScenarioEngagementPlan.SOMEngagementPlanId__c}}'
OCEResults.sfQuery: select OCE__StartDate__c, OCE__EndDate__c, OCE__Status__c, OCE__Territory__c, OCE__Type__c,OCE__UniqueIntegrationID__c,Name from OCE__PlanCycle__c where OCE__Period__r.OCE__UniqueIntegrationID__c = '{{ScenarioEngagementPlan.SOMEngagementPlanId__c}}' order by OCE__StartDate__c

OCEResults.query: SELECT acc."Name", terr."Name" "Territory" FROM output."OMEngagementResult" r join static."OMAccount" acc on acc."Id" = r."OMAccountId" join output."OMTerritory" terr on terr."SOMTerritoryId" = r."SOMTerritoryId" where r."SOMEngagementPlanId" = '{{ScenarioEngagementPlan.SOMEngagementPlanId__c}}' ORDER BY acc."Name";
OCEResults.sfQuery: select OCE__Account__r.Name, OCE__PlanCycle__r.OCE__Territory__c from OCE__AccountGoal__c where OCE__AccountGoal__c.OCE__Plancycle__r.OCE__Period__r.OCE__UniqueIntegrationId__c = '{{ScenarioEngagementPlan.SOMEngagementPlanId__c}}' order by OCE__Account__r.Name

OCEResults.query: with ind as ( select position(':',"Targets",position('Channel' IN "Targets"))+2 as channel_pos, position('"',"Targets",position(':',"Targets",position('Channel' IN "Targets"))+2) as channel_end, position(':',"Targets",position('Frequency' IN "Targets"))+1 as freq_pos, position(',',"Targets",position(':',"Targets",position('Frequency' IN "Targets"))+1) as freq_end, "SOMEngagementResultId" from OUTPUT."OMEngagementResult" ) select acc."Name",Terr."UniqueIntegrationId" "Territory", substr("Targets",channel_pos, channel_end-channel_pos) "ActivityPlanConfigName", substr("Targets",freq_pos, freq_end-freq_pos) "HQGoal" from OUTPUT."OMEngagementResult" er join static."OMAccount" acc on acc."Id" = er."OMAccountId" join ind on ind."SOMEngagementResultId" = er."SOMEngagementResultId" join output."OMTerritory" terr on terr."SOMTerritoryId" = er."SOMTerritoryId" where er."SOMEngagementPlanId" = '{{ScenarioEngagementPlan.SOMEngagementPlanId__c}}' order by acc."Name";
OCEResults.sfQuery: select OCE__AccountGoal__r.OCE__Account__r.Name, OCE__AccountGoal__r.OCE__PlanCycle__r.OCE__Territory__c, OCE__ActivityPlanConfigName__c, OCE__HQGoal__c from OCE__ActivityPlan__c where OCE__AccountGoal__r.OCE__PlanCycle__r.OCE__Period__r.OCE__UniqueIntegrationID__c = '{{ScenarioEngagementPlan.SOMEngagementPlanId__c}}' order by OCE__AccountGoal__r.OCE__Account__r.Name
